content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Please keep in mind that the apartment is 25 square meters and I am looking to maximize my gains. What rental price are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to offer 500 euros per month. How about you?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. While I appreciate your interest, I must say that I am looking for a higher rental price. I would be willing to discuss further if you are open to negotiating. What is your maximum offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My maximum offer is 600 euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?

If not, I am willing to consider other options.

If you are interested, I can also provide you with other details about the apartment and the area. It is located in a nice neighborhood with good transportation options and easy access to the city center. Additionally, the apartment has been recently renovated and comes with all modern amenities such as a washing machine and dishwasher.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must say that I am still looking for a higher rental price. I would be willing to discuss further if you are open to negotiating. What is your minimum offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
